iata:invoiceLineNumber.description: Identifies uniquely each line-item contained in the document.

iata:invoiceLineType.description: invoice line type: ITM for Item, PCK for Packing, FRT for Freight charge, INS for Insurance charge for invoice charges breakdown

iata:invoiceLineNote.description: Contains an item level text note. Free text

iata:invoiceLineTotalQuantity.description: Contains the total quantity purchased at line-item level.

iata:invoiceLineSubTotalAmount.description: CALCULATED: Total Net Value per line-item (Total Quantity multiplied by Unit Price divided by Price-Basis Quantity)

iata:invoiceLineDiscountableAmount.description: EQUALS invoiceLineSubTotalAmount which is the amount on which the Discount Percent will be applied.

iata:invoiceLineDiscountPercent.description: Discount Percent holds the discount rate as a percentage.

iata:invoiceLineDiscountCode.description: Reason Code is used to communicate the reason that a rebates is applied to the product.

iata:invoiceLineDiscountDescription.description: Describes the rebate code applied to the product.

iata:invoiceLineTaxPercent.description: Duty/Tax/Fee Percent holds the Duty/Tax/Fee rate as a percentage (e.g. 19.6).

iata:invoiceLineTaxExemptReason.description: Exempt Code is used to communicate the reason that a product is exempt from Duty/Tax/Fee

iata:invoiceLineTaxType.description: Duty/Tax/Fee Type identifies the type of the Duty/Tax/Fee (ValueAddedTax, GoodsAndServicesTax). From the Code List. CODEDValueAddedTax, GoodsAndServicesTax

iata:invoiceLineTaxCategory.description: Duty/Tax/Fee Category indicates the category of the tax (e.g. StandardRate, Exempt from Tax) and, by implication, the rate that applies. The actual percentage is dependent on the tax jurisdiction.

iata:invoiceLineTaxFunction.description: Duty/Tax/Fee Function indicates the function/purpose of the Duty/Tax/Fee element.

iata:invoiceLineTaxDescription.description: Describes the function/purpose of the Duty/Tax/Fee element.
